name: DOKA 3 STO SLOEV KISHKOV
description: DOKA 3 is a game where you kill zombies in the most sophisticated ways.  There you can think of a certain area. You are given a variety of weapons, you can do trade 2. Trade is now 2 times better.  Especially for this game was developed a unique technology “ULTRA PC GLORIOUS GAMING KISHKI”. It allows you to spawn HD guts for an unlimited time.
